sentences.en: a colossal statue of the King
But just before the competition closed, a lorry arrived at the factory with a truly colossal biscuit which weighed 2400 pounds.
sentences.cn: 但是竞赛赐要结束, 一辆卡车来到了工厂,带来一块真正巨大的饼干,它的重量是2400磅.

sentences.en: During the 1970 s Christo had expanded his concept of art to a colossal scale.
sentences.cn: 在70年代,克里斯托把他的艺术概念扩大到异常的尺度.

sentences.en: Even by modern standards, the 46, 000 ton Titanic was a colossal ship.
sentences.cn: 即使按照现代的标准看, 那46, 000吨的泰坦斯尼克号也是一艘巨轮.

sentences.en: Everything about the two ships was on a colossal scale.
sentences.cn: 这两艘舰的一切都是庞大的.

sentences.en: He spoke with solemnity and his colossal misshapen nose made what he said very quaint.
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地说清,他那丑陋的大鼻子使他说的话显得非常古怪.

sentences.en: If Congress would make a sufficient appropriation, a colossal benefit would result.
sentences.cn: 如果国会能拨出一笔足够的专款,就会产生绝大的好处.

sentences.en: It'seems as if human agency could affect this colossal power.
sentences.cn: 真好象人力能够左右这庞大无比的力量似的.

sentences.en: Plagues aside, many critics see xenotransplantation as a colossal waste of resources.
sentences.cn: 除了疫病外, 许多批评家把异种移植看作是资源的巨大浪费.

sentences.en: She's a cinch to beat the Colossal, and I got even money!
sentences.cn: 她会稳稳当当地打败快逻号我会赢钱的!

sentences.en: Some of the tall buildings in that city are colossal.
sentences.cn: 那座城市里的高层建筑很庞大.

sentences.en: The guide showed us a colossal statue of Jupiter, in the Vatican.
sentences.cn: 在梵蒂冈,向导领我们参观了一座朱庇特巨像.

sentences.en: The singer earns a colossal amount of money.
sentences.cn: 那歌手现在可赚大钱了。

sentences.en: There has been a colossal waste of public money.
sentences.cn: 一直存在巨大的公款浪费。

sentences.en: Think of the colossal nerve of the man - the Machiavellian subtlety of his brain.
sentences.cn: 请想一想这个家伙的异乎寻常的胆量――具有权术家的多端诡计的头脑.

sentences.en: This is indeed a colossal success.
sentences.cn: 这确实是个巨大的成功.

sentences.en: This whole holiday was a colossal waste of money.
sentences.cn: 这次度假浪费了大量的钱财。

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something is extremely large
